sentence.Network_en: He kept the club wrapped in sackcloth.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一直用麻袋布包着棍子。

sentence.Network_en: He went on about his irresponsible behaviour, the dreadful effect it would have on his children and so on. It was all sackcloth and ashes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他接着又说到了自己不负责任的行为以及可能对孩子们造成的恶劣影响等等。一时间捶胸顿足，懊悔不已。

sentence.Network_en: " What does he put sackcloth and ashes on his head for? " inquired Huck.
sentence.Network_cn: 哈克问: “ 他们头上缠粗麻布、抹着灰干嘛? ”

在古时以色列,人们也有“披麻”风俗,不过,他们“披麻”不一定是守孝:崇拜上帝、忏悔或者哀悼的时候,他们都会穿粗麻衣 (sackcloth),还会在头上撒些灰 (ashes),以.

jx.jx_en_mean: used with allusion to the wearing of sackcloth and having ashes sprinkled on the head as a sign of penitence or mourning (Matt 11:21)
jx.jx_cn_mean: 悲痛；忏悔（穿麻衣且撒灰于头上为忏悔或哀悼的表示，见《马太福音》 11: 21)

entry.def: Sackcloth is rough woven material that is used to make sacks.

example.ex: He kept the club wrapped in sackcloth.
example.tran: 他一直用麻袋布包着棍子。

entry.def: If you talk about sackcloth or sackcloth and ashes you are referring to an exaggerated attempt by someone to show that they are sorry for doing something wrong.

example.ex: He went on about his irresponsible behaviour, the dreadful effect it would have on his children and so on. It was all sackcloth and ashes.
example.tran: 他接着又说到了自己不负责任的行为以及可能对孩子们造成的恶劣影响等等。一时间捶胸顿足，懊悔不已。

means.word_mean: 1. a garment made of coarse sacking; formerly worn as an indication of remorse

auth_sentence.content: This sounds, the pair write, like wearing sackcloth.

auth_sentence.content: The sackcloth and ashes have been dispensed with corporate Britain is donning its dinner jacket once again for black-tie bashes.
